channel.title: Hyperion Error?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!
channel.description:
This is what happens when I run the hyperion source.
Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Jul 15, 2010 2:02:27 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. Jul 15, 2010 2:02:27 AM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheExceptio n: No index files present. at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blockin gExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: No index files present. at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:75) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:44) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source ) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Jul 15, 2010 2:02:27 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Press any key to continue . . .
SOMEONE HELP!

item.title: Hyperion Error?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @ferasownz12 ferasownz12
item.description:
@ferasownz12 wrote:

This is what happens when I run the hyperion source.

Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.Server main
INFO: Starting Hyperion…
Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init
INFO: Loading definitions…
Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind
INFO: Binding to port : 43595…
Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind
INFO: Binding to port : 8080…
Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start
INFO: Ready
Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind
INFO: Binding to port : 43594…
Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager
INFO: Loading scripts…
Jul 15, 2010 2:02:24 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start
INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks…
Jul 15, 2010 2:02:27 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init
INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions.
Jul 15, 2010 2:02:27 AM org.hyperion.Server main
SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion.
java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheExceptio
n: No index files present.
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source)
at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blockin
gExecutorService.java:50)
at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74)
at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36)
Caused by: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: No index files present.
at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.(Cache.java:75)
at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:44)
at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125)
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source
)
at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Jul 15, 2010 2:02:27 AM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init
INFO: Loading definitions…
Press any key to continue . . .

SOMEONE HELP!

Read full topic
